---
title: "Ctenotus taeniolatus"
output: html_document
---

*Ctenotus taeniolatus* are found in Eastern Australia inhabiting bushland and heathland.  
Their physical characteristics involve long limbs, a long tail and light and dark stripes down the body.  
They mainly eat small invertebrates such as insects and worms.
